name: StayVista at Pax and Opis
desc: Pax and Opis by Vista Rooms offers a luxurious base for enjoying a wonderful holiday amidst the scenic hills of Mussoorie and Dehradun. Soak in stunning mountain views from the terrace and living area. Spend leisure hours in the  entertainment room or enjoy a good read at the in-house library. Enjoy a lovely bonfire and barbeque evening organised by the property on request.
